channel.title: [how to]Homemade Hookah!
channel.description:
[COLOR=red]Disclaimer: This is for educational purposes only, I am not responsible for whatever may happen as a result of this guide.[/COLOR]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6MfRSdwGWU0
So I decided to get a little innovative today and in school I had an Idea... "I want to make a homemade hookah" Lol, basically out of bordom I thought this would be a little fun project to challenge me and see how creative I can get. Some of you may of remembered my guide on the Homemade waterpipe, That guide was a fail because it was filled with dangerous parts that could harm you if ingested (I.E: Tin foil.) This hookah is safe and is actually to my supriise very nice!
Onto the guide!
[b][u]Materials you'll need[/u][/b] - [b]Chamber[/b] (This can be anything a plastic bottle, Jar, In my case I used an old easter egg case) - [b]A hose(s)[/b] (I used some hose I picked up at walmart for bike pumps but you can use anything like garden hose) - [b]Hot glue gun[/b] (Gorilla glue also works fine since its heat proof but I don't recommend Super glue) [You can substitue glue out for tape if you want but only electrical or Duct tape - [b]Stem[/b] (In my case I used a gutted tire pressure gauge but an emptied mechanical pencil/pen works fine also) - [b]Bowl[/b] (I used a socket that was 7/16 but anything that fits your stem will work doesn't have to be exact) - [b]Water[/b] (duh...) - [b]Screen[/b] (This can be pretty much anything from stopping ashes from entering You can use I used a screen from under a sink faucet you can use steel wool. AVOID TIN FOIL AT ALL COST ONLY USE AS A LAST RESORT
----------------------------------------------------------- [b]STEP 1: HOLES[/b]
- Depending on what type of chamber, and how many hoses you are using the holes can differ, But you MUST have 2. 1: For the bowl and stem and the other for the hose attachment
- Measure or estimate the width of the Stem and hose and cut out your whole accordingly I used a knife and smoothed out the edges with a razor blade you want to try and get this as accurate as possible so its less glue you must use to seal it.
- Seal ANY holes that you wont be using, In mine I had 2 tiny holes at the bottom that I sealed with hot glue. ------------------------------------------------------------
[b]STEP 2: ASSEMBLY[/b]
- Take the stem you have and attach it to the bowl (Probably a socket)
- Make sure they fit if they don't exactly fit thats fine just make it as best as possible
- Seal the bowl and stem with the hot glue at the base of the socket where they both connect
- Take your screen and shove it into the bowl or if you're using steel wool shove it into the stem.
- Place the bowl and stem in the assigned hole and seal around it with glue or tape (Gum will work also but as a last resort) so that the only air that can get threw is via the bowl threw the stem
- Once you seal the bowl and stem take your hose and insert it into the other hole(s) (no pun intended ;)) be careful that you dont melt the hose with the hot glue gun so keep the metal tip away from it gum would actually be safer if you are afraid of it burning a hole threw.
- now add water to it and you are done! Easy as that!
- MAKE SURE EVERYTHING IS SEALED for the best results.
Enjoy!!!!
-------- Hits smoother than a cucumber (lolwut?). Its fucking boss.

item.title: [how to]Homemade Hookah!
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Bebe, post:17, topic:366285”][quote author=Andrew link=topic=462484.msg3475820#msg3475820 date=1295701796]

well, who said smoking tin foil is unhealthy?

and uh i assumed the hookah was for tobacco, fair enuf

Your absolutely right, you smoke shisha out of a hookah - which is tobacco. If anyone here ever buys a hookah, don’t smoke weed out of it. Stains everything including the bowl, then you can’t smoke in public. Smoking a hookah at the beach is the most relaxing thing in the world.

Lol, If I want to smoke Tobacco out of a Hookah I go to a Hookah bar, for everything else its Marijuana. Also if you knew how to clean your piece you still can smoke in public you still can smoke even if you haven’t and your smoking tobacco. Honestly what is someone going to do walk up to you and say “Hey empty out that bowl and let me inspect it to see if there is any trace amounts of Marijuana resin!”

Um, yeah they are. Cops make you take the hookah apart to check for that, genius. Also, if you’ve ever even smoked marijuana, getting resin out of a hookah would mean boiling all the pieces of your hookah. Anf if you have a half decent one, it will be too big to boil.
[/quote]
Since when is boiling water the only method possible for cleaning out marijuana resin?[/quote]This. They sell commercial cleaning solutions for bongs and pipes, one would assume they’d work in a hookah as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [how to]Homemade Hookah!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“pkedpker, post:11, topic:366285”]idk what smoking tin foil causes but if it’s made of aluminium then you can get alzheimers. Other then that there is much worser things you can smoke from and they are sold in 99 cent china shops. Those are the cigar pipes made of plastic yes you inhale plastic which causes all kinds of problems such as cancers/headaches/brain damage! anything that can melt releases toxins.

Also from doing research it turns out burning plastic can produce hydrogen cyanide which if you read on wikipedia states

A hydrogen cyanide concentration of 300 mg/m3 in air will kill a human within about 10 minutes. It is estimated that hydrogen cyanide at a concentration of 3500 ppm (about 3200 mg/m3) will kill a human in about 1 minute.

Only thing you can smoke is wood/glass[/quote]Oxidized aluminum promotes Alzheimers.

item.title: [how to]Homemade Hookah!
item.dc:creator: @Zvek420 Zvek420
item.description:
@Zvek420 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew, post:4, topic:366285”]Or go to the head shop and buy one for 15$…

Also, many people use tin foil in hookah’s because you use coals so it’s fine.[/quote]

There is a difference between going out and buying one to making one. For me I can go out and buy one like I have with Pipes and bongs, that doesn’t stop me from making them…why? Because its fun, interesting to see how far you can go with it. Plus its a great way to stay in shape. Also not everyone will use coals on this, even if they do its still not a wise idea to use tin foil. Why take the risk when you can have something that looks a lot better than wrapping your bowl in tin foil.

Unhandled:

I would use tinfoil over fucking steel wool any day.

Why? Tin Foil can be very harmful to your health while all you do with steel wool is jam it into the stem where its not seen or burned. You put it about 1-2 inches away from the bowl so it doesn’t get too hot. You can also get a screen from your sinks which is what I did in this particular video. It’s not like I’m going to stop you from using steel wool its not like it would hurt me any, just personally I wouldn’t recommend it.

Read full topic

item.title: [how to]Homemade Hookah!
item.dc:creator: @Zvek420 Zvek420
item.description:
@Zvek420 wrote:

[COLOR=red]Disclaimer: This is for educational purposes only, I am not responsible for whatever may happen as a result of this guide.[/COLOR]

So I decided to get a little innovative today and in school I had an Idea… “I want to make a homemade hookah” Lol, basically out of bordom I thought this would be a little fun project to challenge me and see how creative I can get. Some of you may of remembered my guide on the Homemade waterpipe, That guide was a fail because it was filled with dangerous parts that could harm you if ingested (I.E: Tin foil.) This hookah is safe and is actually to my supriise very nice!

Onto the guide!

Materials you’ll need

  • Chamber (This can be anything a plastic bottle, Jar, In my case I used an old easter egg case)
  • A hose(s) (I used some hose I picked up at walmart for bike pumps but you can use anything like garden hose)
  • Hot glue gun (Gorilla glue also works fine since its heat proof but I don’t recommend Super glue) [You can substitue glue out for tape if you want but only electrical or Duct tape
  • Stem (In my case I used a gutted tire pressure gauge but an emptied mechanical pencil/pen works fine also)
  • Bowl (I used a socket that was 7/16 but anything that fits your stem will work doesn’t have to be exact)
  • Water (duh…)
  • Screen (This can be pretty much anything from stopping ashes from entering You can use I used a screen from under a sink faucet you can use steel wool. AVOID TIN FOIL AT ALL COST ONLY USE AS A LAST RESORT

STEP 1: HOLES

  • Depending on what type of chamber, and how many hoses you are using the holes can differ, But you MUST have 2. 1: For the bowl and stem and the other for the hose attachment

  • Measure or estimate the width of the Stem and hose and cut out your whole accordingly I used a knife and smoothed out the edges with a razor blade you want to try and get this as accurate as possible so its less glue you must use to seal it.

  • Seal ANY holes that you wont be using, In mine I had 2 tiny holes at the bottom that I sealed with hot glue.

STEP 2: ASSEMBLY

  • Take the stem you have and attach it to the bowl (Probably a socket)

  • Make sure they fit if they don’t exactly fit thats fine just make it as best as possible

  • Seal the bowl and stem with the hot glue at the base of the socket where they both connect

  • Take your screen and shove it into the bowl or if you’re using steel wool shove it into the stem.

  • Place the bowl and stem in the assigned hole and seal around it with glue or tape (Gum will work also but as a last resort) so that the only air that can get threw is via the bowl threw the stem

  • Once you seal the bowl and stem take your hose and insert it into the other hole(s) (no pun intended ;)) be careful that you dont melt the hose with the hot glue gun so keep the metal tip away from it gum would actually be safer if you are afraid of it burning a hole threw.

  • now add water to it and you are done! Easy as that!

  • MAKE SURE EVERYTHING IS SEALED for the best results.

Enjoy!!!

Hits smoother than a cucumber (lolwut?). Its fucking boss.

Read full topic
